participant_1.background:
I love to learn about the universe and everything in it, so I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature.
I treasure my computer because it's how I make my music.
My most valuable possession is my intellect, which I plan to use to take over the world.
I loved spending hours in the woods behind my house, making up stories and worlds.
i ride my bike to class since its only a mile away.

i love to read books.
I am a chef who loves to travel and share my food with others.
I'm a musician who travels a lot, and I sometimes worry about my cats when I'm gone.
I enjoy color correcting my makeup looks for my colorblind viewers.

content.text: I'm a musician who loves to travel and share my food with others. What do you like to do?
I'm a chef who loves to travel and share my food with others!  I also enjoy color correcting my makeup looks for my colorblind viewers.
What do you like most about traveling?
I love meeting new people and trying new foods!
That's awesome! I love learning about different cultures.
Me too! I also love trying new things.
What's the most interesting thing you've learned about a culture while traveling?
I learned that in Sweden, they eat lutefisk for Christmas. It's a fish that's been soaked in lye, and it's really salty!
Wow, that sounds interesting! I've never heard of lutefisk before.
But it's a really traditional Swedish dish.
I'm glad you're enjoying your travels!
Me too! It's so much fun to see the world.
I'm sure it is! I've never been out of the country before.
You should definitely go sometime! It's an amazing experience.
